  • Constructor Details

    • Cruser

      public Cruser(GamePanel gp, KeyHandler keyH)
      Constructor for the Cruser
      Parameters:
      gp - the GamePanel is needed for it's values
      keyH - a KeyHandler is needed to make the cursor to respond to keyboard input

  • Method Details

    • setDefaultValues

      public void setDefaultValues()
      sets the default values for the cursor

    • getCruserImage

      public void getCruserImage()
      loads and stores the different images for this cursor

    • update

      public void update()
      the method that is being called while the Thread is running this is where cursor responds to keyboard input

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      this is required for painting the changes on screen
      Parameters:
      g2 - is needed because the movement of the cursor depends on how far it is from the sides of the screen or the map

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(Tile destination)
      needed because cursor can't just be moved to a worldX,worldY coordinate, it needs to move by simple movements here the cursor gets moved to the coordinates of the given tile
      Parameters:
      destination - the tile to which the cursor will be moved

      public boolean isNotNearScreenEdge()
      if cursor is not close to the edge of the screen, it moves relative to the screen
      Returns:
